This is where I need to step up to lead and to help everybody around me...
...and kind of take on that leadership.
I really feel that my goal of becoming one of the best players in the world is attainable.
And I think that each and every day, I'm getting closer and closer to that.
I wanna continue to just fight like an underdog so that I can reach that goal.
I'm Carli Lloyd, center midfielder for the US Women's National Team.
